title: New webinar series focused on overlooked and overburdened populations
content:
The first webinar is scheduled for August 24, 2022. Credit: NIHHIS

The first webinar is scheduled for August 24, 2022. Credit: NIHHIS The National Integrated Heat Health Information System (NIHHIS) is hosting a new webinar series focusing on specific groups that are disproportionately at risk of heat illness or death, but are often overlooked in general treatments of at-risk groups. The idea is to provide a deep background level of understanding on the group and what mechanisms contribute to their heightened risk, as well as solutions that address those mechanisms.
